name: So You Joined a Gang...
description:
Group 3:

- Bryce Kibbe

- Justus Stephens

- Hunter Kindlin

So a cyborg, a medieval adventurer, and a cat highly skilled in ninjitsu all walk into a dystopian factory...

## How to Play

### Controls

#### All Characters

Movement - WASD or arrow keys

Special Ability - Space or left mouse

#### Adventurer

Run - Double tap movement direction

Crouch - C key

Ability - Sword Slash - Costs a star to use

Extra - can double jump - Costs a star to use

#### Cat Ninja

Has better speed and floatier jump

Ability - Fireball - Costs a star to use

#### Cyborg

Has snappy controls, but has no way to defeat enemies

Ability - Midair Dash - Costs a star to use

### In Game

Approach the crystals to switch out your player.

Touch a star to enable the player's ability. The player can hold a maximum of 3 stars.

Kill enemies by using Adventurer's or Cat Ninja's special ability.

Enter the door and the end of the level to complete the level.
